string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: General knowledge is an important component of crystallized intelligence and is strongly associated with general intelligence, and with openness to experience. Studies have found that people who are highly knowledgeable in a particular domain tend to be knowledgeable in many.
History is the study of the past as it is described in written documents.

Culture is the social behavior and norms found in human societies. Culture is considered a central concept in anthropology, encompassing the range of phenomena that are transmitted through social learning in human societies
Nature includes questions of natural wonders, landscapes....
Sciene is a systemtic enterprise that builds and organizes knowledge in the form of testable explanations.....
